title: What happens when I report someone?
body:
Hi, I have a pretty general question. I've noticed some people have posted LoL client screenshots of notifications they've received following Riot's investigation of a player they reported. However, I've never received this notification myself despite reporting negative/toxic behaviour. Does this mean none of my reports were deemed warranted? Am I even supposed to be receiving these notifications that other posters speak of? I've never submitted a frivolous report so that's why I thought I would ask. 

Thanks!

replies.body:
Great question, and just because you haven't seen a punishment notification does not mean players have not been punished for your reports.

The system only sends notifications to players that reported the offending player in the final game before their punishment. This does not mean your reports weren't considered for the punishment.

>The system only sends notifications to players that reported the offending player in the final game before their punishment.

Are there any intentions to change that? Because that would still be a great thing to change for clarity lol

I have a question to ask, and I really just need a yes or a no answer to whether the report system cares or not since if it doesn't I won't bother reporting such things anymore:

I had a situation arise in a bot game where someone said something extremely offensive and hateful that was not directed to any of the human players, but had it been said towards humans I'm thinking it was in the realms of a 14-day suspension.

If said player is reported in an AI game does it carry any weight on their record?
